Class CharacterVirtualSettingsRef

java.lang.Object
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.JoltPhysicsObject
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.template.Ref
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.CharacterVirtualSettingsRef
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstCharacterBaseSettings, ConstCharacterVirtualSettings, ConstJoltPhysicsObject, AutoCloseable, Comparable<JoltPhysicsObject>
public final class CharacterVirtualSettingsRef extends Ref implements ConstCharacterVirtualSettings
A counted reference to a CharacterVirtualSettings object. (native type: Ref<CharacterVirtualSettings>)

      Parameters:
      remove - true to remove ghost contacts (default=false)

      Parameters:
